duties_responsibilities.duty: Champion continuous delivery and assist teams through the transition to a rapid deployment model.

Design and build pipelines, educate teams on the reasons for needing them, propose, share, and refine best practices on release engineering, containerization, environment management, build/deployment automation, general process automation, and scripting.
Design new applications and build transition approaches for existing ones, including architectural reviews, hands-on refactoring of stacks alongside teams, and shaping infrastructure transitions.
Advance and refine the use of Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) and link it to success in the CI/CD space, with an emphasis on automation.
Proactively seek out clarifications, problems, and misunderstandings, and drive hard transitions through to success.
Be a change agent, bringing the energy and sophistication necessary to lead and drive decision making in the journey to application modernization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in relevant field
